summary: A group of people visit a weird old man who is a student of the black arts. The man lives in an ancient, cursed castle. Soon people in the group start being killed off.
cast: Nadja Tiller|Jean-Claude Brialy|Perrette Pradier|Edith Scob|Walter Giller|Frédéric Duvallès|Héléna Manson|René Génin|Claude Piéplu|Dany Jacquet|Gabriel Jabbour|Catherine Rich|Antoine Balpêtré|Claude Rich
title: La cámara ardiente
